CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.Account.AccountNumber ), '00000', LPAD(Opportunity__r.Account.AccountNumber, 5, '0') ) + '-' + IF(ISBLANK( Opportunity__r.Loan_No__c ), '00', LPAD(Opportunity__r.Loan_No__c, 2, '0') ) + '-' + IF(ISBLANK(Drawdown_Number__c), '00',LPAD(TEXT(Drawdown_Number__c), 2, '0') )
CustomField.label: Drawdown Full Number
